4. These bytes are then decoded as UTF-8 text

The message appears to be encoded using this method, and when decoded, would reveal a sentence about Africa's colonial history.

<answer>In 1884-85 European powers met in Berlin to renounce possession of Africa, that magnificent colony, the complete conquest of which cost her the labor of 400 years.</answer>
